subject: Self Care
title: Dopamine and Digital Habits
description: Learn Dopamine and Digital Habits in one minute.

hook.text: Dopamine isn't the pleasure chemical. It's the anticipation chemical. Your phone exploits that distinction perfectly.

buildup.text: Dopamine surges not when you get the reward, but when you expect one might come. The maybe is more powerful than the yes.

discovery.text: Every time you check your phone, dopamine spikes in anticipation. Even boring results don't stop the next check.

twist.text: Over time, baseline dopamine drops. You need more stimulation for the same effect. Digital tolerance mirrors addiction.

climax.text: Break the cycle: delay phone checks by 10 minutes. The anticipation fades. Dopamine normalizes. You regain control.

punchline.text: Dopamine drives the check. Delay the check. Break the loop.

quiz.question: When does dopamine spike in relation to phone checking?
options: In anticipation before checking, not after
Dopamine isn't involved in phone use
